comment: Don't followback. It makes no sense. Most accounts produce very little original content. You end up seeing the same reposts ten times.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG0 (y / you)

            :ARG1 (ii / it))

comment: Using the word 'retard' is offensive to the mentally disable since its a direct attack to their disability. Refrain from such words.
